DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multi-center , observational study evaluate factor influence use tocilizumab ( RoActemra/Actemra ) monotherapy rheumatoid arthritis patient real life set . Data collect participant 12 month follow initiation tocilizumab treatment .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study RoActemra/Actemra ( Tocilizumab ) As Monotherapy Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients Routine Clinical Practice
DOC.criteria: Adult participant , > /= 18 year age Patients rheumatoid arthritis rheumatologist decides start tocilizumab combination DMARD monotherapy Current participation clinical trial rheumatoid arthritis
